divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home, thought being chased. When I came over the hill toward my remote home I saw 15 objects sitting still hovering. Seemed to be emitting light energy. I went into house and got video camera. Took lots of video adn I think even an entity and maybe some rods. I felt anxious and my heart was racing while doing the video taping. I felt OK after. The alien looked like a demon to me. I kept taping until the battery died on the camera then I went into the house and stayed awake to daylight as I was a little anxious over what I saw. Digital tape being duplicated and DVD will be given to MUFON State Director.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Deer Trail
There were no other sightings in Deer Trail on or around July 25th 2006
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
